introduction.title: üåü Welcome to the Shinkofa Holistic Questionnaire
introduction.subtitle: A journey of self-discovery through 144 questions
introduction.purpose: This questionnaire is designed to establish your complete holistic profile, integrating psychology, neurodivergence, Human Design, astrology, numerology, and the Shinkofa philosophy.
introduction.whatYouWillDiscover:
## What you will discover:

- üß† **Psychology**: MBTI, Big Five, Enneagram, NLP, Process Communication Model
- üåà **Neurodivergence**: ADD/ADHD, ASD, Giftedness, Hypersensitivity
- üéØ **Shinkofa**: Wheel of Life, Archetypes, Values, Vision
- ‚ö° **Human Design**: Type, Authority, Strategy, Profile
- ‚ú® **Astrology**: Western birth chart + Chinese astrology
- üî¢ **Numerology**: Life Path, Expression Number, Soul Mission
introduction.howItWorks:
## How it works:

1. **144 questions** divided into 9 thematic blocks
2. **Auto-save**: your answers are recorded in real-time
3. **Resume anytime**: you can quit and resume at any time
4. **Duration**: 45-60 minutes (take your time)
5. **AI Analysis**: SHIZEN will analyze your answers to generate your unique profile
introduction.importantNotes:
## Important notes:

‚ö†Ô∏è **Answer authentically**: this questionnaire is for YOU. Be honest with yourself.

üîí **Privacy**: your data is secure and will never be shared without your consent.

üí° **No "right" answers**: this questionnaire explores your uniqueness, not your performance.

‚è∞ **Take your time**: settle comfortably in a quiet place where you won't be disturbed.
introduction.ready: Ready to begin your journey of discovery?

step1.title: üåü Welcome to Shinkofa!
step1.description: The Shinkofa Way (Áúü„ÅÆÊ≠©) means "The True Step". We accompany you in your holistic personal development with powerful tools and a caring approach.

step2.title: ‚ö†Ô∏è Platform in Active Development
step2.description: Shinkofa is continuously improving! We add new features and fix bugs **several times a week**. Your patience and feedback are precious. üôè

step3.title: üè† Dashboard - Your Central Hub
step3.description: The Dashboard displays an overview of your tasks, projects and daily rituals. It's your daily starting point to track your progress.

step4.title: ü§ñ Shizen AI - Your AI Coach
step4.description: SHIZEN is your personal holistic coach powered by AI. Ask questions about your development, request advice, or discuss your challenges. It understands and supports you.

step5.title: üìã Planner - Organize Your Life
step5.description:
The Planner includes 4 sections:

‚Ä¢ **Tasks**: Manage your daily to-dos
‚Ä¢ **Projects**: Group related tasks
‚Ä¢ **Journals**: Write your reflections
‚Ä¢ **Rituals**: Create recurring routines

step6.title: üìã Tasks - Simple Management
step6.description: Create tasks with priorities (High, Medium, Low), deadlines, and tags. Mark them as completed to track your productivity. You can also create tasks directly from a project!

step7.title: üìÅ Projects - Structure Your Goals
step7.description: A project groups several related tasks. For example: "Learn piano" can contain tasks "Buy keyboard", "Take 1st lesson", etc. Click on a project to see its tasks and create new ones.

step8.title: üìì Journals - Personal Reflection
step8.description: Write journal entries to track your thoughts, emotions and progress. Tags help you categorize (e.g. #gratitude, #learning). It's your private reflection space.

step9.title: üîÑ Rituals - Recurring Routines
step9.description: Rituals are habits you want to anchor: morning meditation, exercise, reading... Define frequency (daily, weekly) and track your consistency.

step10.title: üë§ Profile - Personalize Your Experience
step10.description: Complete your profile with your personal information. You can modify your name, first name, birth date, and change your password at any time.

step11.title: üåà Holistic Profile - Know Yourself
step11.description: Take the holistic questionnaire to discover your Human Design, astrological profile, and AI-personalized synthesis. It's a unique map of who you are. ‚ú®

step12.title: üåì Dark/Light Theme
step12.description: Shinkofa supports dark and light themes. Click on the sun/moon icon in the top right to switch. Your choice is saved automatically.

step13.title: ‚ö° Quick Actions Menu
step13.description:
A floating button at the bottom right allows you to quickly access common actions:

‚Ä¢ Create a new task
‚Ä¢ Create a new project
‚Ä¢ Create a journal entry
‚Ä¢ Start a ritual

A handy shortcut to save time! üöÄ

step14.title: üí¨ Need Help?
step14.description:
If you encounter a bug or have questions:

‚Ä¢ Contact us via support (home page)
‚Ä¢ Check the FAQ
‚Ä¢ Use Shizen AI for general questions

We're here for you! ü§ù

step15.title: üöÄ Let's Go!
step15.description:
You're now ready to explore Shinkofa. Remember: every small step counts. The Shinkofa Way is a journey, not a destination.

Enjoy your journey! üåø

holisticProfileWarning.title: üåü Take time to deeply explore your profile
holisticProfileWarning.message:
Your holistic profile is an intimate map of who you are. Take time to explore it alone first and get familiar with it.

Neurodivergence and revealed particularities are not always understood by everyone. Choose carefully who you share this information with.
